lines.text: Why we got to paint both sides of the rocks?
You boys ever heard of Korea?
Well then you are probably very familar with the conflict at Hill 442. Is that right?
Yes sir. Everyone has heard of that battle.
And did you know your Colonel is personally responsible for pulling 52 marines off that hill? Alive.
So don't you think the Colonel deserves to have his rocks painted tops and bottoms?
